bottom.description: Height of the player's origin point.

jumpspeed.description: The speed coming out of the rope

jumpcheckspeed.description: Time taken to restore control to the player.

fixdirection.description: Determines if the player can turn on the rope.

hittutaspeed.description: The swinging speed of the rope.

jumpcheckangle.description: The angle where the player can jump fully.

DrawDistance.description: How close the object needs to be to the player before spawning.

ObjName.description: The internal name of the object.

Extra.name: A rope that can be swung on and used as a spring at maximum height.
